# Ha Dong-Jin discusses Korean MMA, the state of TFC & UFC Busan
## Korean John
3880 subscribers
13 likes

### Description
328 views
Posted: 30 Aug 2019
John Hyon Ko of Kumite TV is joined by Korean Top Team/TFC owner Ha Dong-Jin to discuss the debuts of Park Jun-Yong and Jung Da-Un at UFC Shenzhen. 

He also talks about the state of Korean MMA, TFC and UFC Busan in December.

data.title: Favourite artist alert ‚Äì Ha Dong Kyun - A Touch of Drama
data.snippet: I‚Äôve watched some of his intervews and he always comes off as a very earnest and humble guy with a sense of humour. What you see, is what you get ‚Äì no pretending or putting on airs. His words are his own and not conocted by some image consious PR person. I‚Äôve been a fan of CN Blue a lot longer and wanted to see them live for ages, but if I had a chance to go either to their concert or HDK‚Äôs concert, I‚Äôd choose the latter. No contest. This post is dedicated to the one and only Ha Dong Kyun, with ‚Äòthe voice you can‚Äôt forget once you hear him sing‚Äô.^^ [...] Ha Dong Kyun had not stood on a TV stage since 2008 (due to camera phobia?). He was a complete unknow to most foreign fans of Korean music and probably to quite a few younger Koreans as well. So his fans must have been surprised and overjoyed when he was anounced to be one of the performers of IS2‚Äôs 100th program. (Btw. Immortal Song is a GREAT program to discover wonderful but lesser know singers, I recommend it warmly. Subbed episodes can be found @ KBSWorld‚Äôs YT channel.) That stage, where he sang Jeon In Gwon‚Äôs ÏÇ¨ÎûëÌïú ÌõÑÏóê (After Love), seems to have become a new start. He was SO nervous beforehand and in the pre perf intervew said he was nervous (shaking) enough to die, performing in front of cameras was frightening. But once he started singing, it was like all that just melted away and [...] Since that fist encounter I‚Äôve learned considerably more about this amazing singer. He debuted in 2002 as a member of R&B group 7Dayz, which released one album but disbanded soon after. One of the guys, Lee Jung, eventually became a solo songer (he was also quite the regular in IS2 last year) and Ha Dong Kyun with Seo Jae Ho, Jeon Sang Hwan and a new member Kim Jae Seok formed Wanted, another R&B vocal group and made their re-debut in 2004 with their first album called ‚ÄòLike The First‚Äò. Wanted singing Î∞úÏûë (Stroke) @ YD Loveletter.

data.title: Vietnam | Ngoc Dan and her team | TED-Ed Ha Dong - YouTube
data.snippet:
# Listen to us discussing about our country: Vietnam | Ngoc Dan and her team | TED-Ed Ha Dong
## TED-Ed Student Talks
124000 subscribers
2 likes

### Description
32 views
Posted: 13 Aug 2019
Living in Vietnam, these passionate children are proud of their home and culture. Although Vietnam is a small country, they believe that this nation has a vast range of food, architecture, and other details that make the land special in its own way. Therefore, in this Talk, they want to show the world a more detailed look into their country, the unique things it offers, and their own emotions going through valuable experiences. [...] These students attend Van Khe secondary school in Ha Dong, Ha Cau, Vietnam. From the beginning, these kids have shown to possess a tied bond with the country and love everything about it. They hope that with their efforts, more people will know about Vietnam and visit it to feel the excitement and enjoy the beauties like they have done.

TED-Ed, TED's education initiative, inspires tomorrow's TED speakers and future leaders by supporting students in discovering, developing and sharing their big ideas in the form of short, TED-style talks. In the TED-Ed Student Talk program, students work together to discuss and celebrate creative ideas through TED-Ed's flexible curriculum. Check out  if you're interested in getting started. [...] This presentation was completed by participating in a TED-Ed program and produced independently of the TED Conferences. Only approved participants are able to upload TED-Ed Student Talks. 

If you see any video that should be flagged as offensive, please let us know by emailing tededstudents@ted.com

Live performances and performances in I Am a Singer show this tendency even more. According to an interview, he likes rock sounds and admires Deulgukhwa and Lee Seungyeol . According to Nagasu and other comments during interviews and performances, he gets cold sweats and gets dizzy when he sees the red light from the camera or the stage lights during filming. In fact, during the solo concert, as time passed, he showed a more restless appearance. Then, when her friend Lee Jeong comes as a guest, she turns to Lee Jeong next to the stage and sings without looking at the audience. She seemed to act as a tranquilizer.

data.title: Canadian Lawmaker Says China Had Chinese Students Vote for Him
data.snippet:
By Norimitsu Onishi

Reporting from Montreal

A member of Canada‚Äôs Parliament testified on Tuesday that high school students from China were transported by bus to vote for him in a party election that is at the center of a federal inquiry into interference in Canadian elections by China and other foreign countries.

Testifying during a public hearing in Ottawa, the Parliament member, Han Dong, a Chinese-Canadian politician formerly from Prime Minister Justin Trudeau‚Äôs Liberal Party, said that he had met and sought the support of the students from a private high school in 2019, but that he did not know who had chartered or paid for the bus on the day of the election. [...] Mr. Dong‚Äôs testimony was part of an ongoing federal inquiry into foreign meddling in Canada‚Äôs political system, especially the general elections of 2019 and 2021. The inquiry was called after a series of intelligence leaks to the Canadian news media indicated that the Chinese government had interfered in both elections by supporting candidates favorable to its policies and by undermining its critics.
